mapper.sql: id, user_name, real_name, sex, mobile, email, note, position_id
mapper.select: select a.id,user_name,real_name,sex, mobile, from t_user a, t_position b where a.position_id = b.id
mapper.insert: insert into t_user (user_name, real_name,sex, mobile,email,note,position_id) values( #{user.userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{user.realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{user.note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{user.position.id,jdbcType=INTEGER})
